channel.title: Help
channel.description: Ok ive known how to host mopar servers for over a year now, but the thing is, is I used to be able to join my own server on the same pc, but now for some reason it doesnt let me, it just says error server may be down etc. NOTE: Others can join the server but me, and it even says that I am trying to connect on the command promt window, but it just wont let me in

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @kelow kelow
item.description:
@kelow wrote:

is there anyone that can host my server and give me admin etc? (obviously you get admin but yea)

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @kelow kelow
item.description:
@kelow wrote:

No no no, this is my first time hosting a server in prob about 3 or 4 months and i just started a couple days ago, it wouldnt let me login in the first place (not like 4 months ago), and its a new server so i have not used a char file the same as before, and also, i have tryed DOZENS of servers and non of them work for me (well only other people can join(but not me)

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

wierd, what it probably is is that you have like an item that isnt even an item like once i did ::pickup 9999 wich there is no item with the id 9999 so i laged out and i couldnt log back on until i went in my char file and deleted that item

Read full topic
